title: Vancouver Mayor Ken Sim apologizes to councillor for unsubstantiated comments about distributing drugs
desc: Mayor Ken Sim says he has apologized to his council colleague Sean Orr for claiming without evidence in a media briefing earlier this month that Orr distributed illegal drugs. Orr has denied the allegation "unequivocally" and said the comments were ridiculous and defamatory.

title: 21 Orthodox Church Followers Reportedly Killed in the Latest attack in Arsi
desc: 21 followers of Ethiopian Orthodox Church reportedly killed in Sherka district of Arsi, Oromia regional state.  Read more.

title: Three Killed In Worejarso Attack In Oromia Region
desc: Oromo Liberation Army reportedly killed three civilians in Worejarso district, Oromia region of Ethiopia. Read more.

title: Machine learning estimation of FVIII pharmacokinetic parameters in Chinese children with severe Hemophilia A
desc: Hemophilia A is a rare inherited bleeding disorder typically managed with coagulation factor VIII (FVIII) replacement therapy. Designing personalized prophylactic regimens requires accurate pharmacokinetic (PK) characterization; current population PK (popPK) and Bayesian approaches provide a principled framework for individualized dosing, but their routine clinical implementation may still be constrained by model specification requirements and practical considerations in data collection and analysis. Here we present a machine learning (ML) framework, incorporating state-of-the-art language models, to predict individual FVIII PK parameters in pediatric patients. Using minimal sampling and routinely collected clinical data, our approach achieves superior performance over the widely adopted WAPPS-Hemo platform in predicting in vivo recovery (IVR) and FVIII half-life. These findings highlight the potential of AI-driven methods to reduce patient burden while improving accuracy in individualized treatment planning for children with severe hemophilia A.

title: HK star in Penang to learn how to cook famous dishes
desc: HONG Kong star Elena Kong recently flew to Penang to learn how to cook two of its soul foods – asam laksa and hokkien mee (prawn noodles) – while celebrating Chinese New Year here.

title: First Nations Chiefs pass vote of non-confidence in UCP government
desc: First Nations chiefs from across Alberta have unanimously passed a vote of non-confidence in Premier Danielle Smith’s UCP government

title: Can Red Light Therapy Help With Muscle Recovery and Pain?
desc: Experts explain how red light therapy can help with recovery and pain management, and where it falls short.
